column4: Is there any way to have a normal HD boot resemble the live cd's boot? graphically i mean, full screen splash, very concise coloured minimal boot text. Ive got the splash screen at the menu but it goes away after picking an OS and then of course the screen spews out tons of text about everything its doing.
yeah it works great on a netbook, but you have to learn to adapt a few things. -
I don't find the boot process particularly harsh unless you have an older machine
